attributes.action: Help awareness of Maroon Ribbon Campaign - support of women in music industry
attributes.additional_details: The decision to start such a campaign comes from personal experience of sexism and lack of general respect and prejudice, which covertly gets swept under the carpet.
attributes.background: The Maroon Ribbon Campaign of 2008 is helping to support women working in the music industry - to support and encourage more respectable roles and equality.  Help to pave the way for generations to come

rejection.details: Petitions need to clearly explain what action they would like the Government or Parliament to take. They also need to be started in the name of an individual, not an organisation.
